page.title: 04Sandra Kendrick an adult day
page.content: I rise at 7.30 and I start organising the children for school. While they are eating breakfast, I make the beds and clean up. At 9.00 the girls Claire and Nina leave for school <ELLIOT TOWN PRIMARY SCHOOL>, and then I clean the kitchen. I leave for work at 9.30, to work at my fathers "Off Licence" which closes at 13.00. My afternoon is spent dressmaking, gardening or cleaning; also I prepare dinner for my husband who is a welder, and my children. When the family are home and dinner is over, I sometimes go cycling or for a walk with my family. The girls go to bed around 21.30 and then my husband and I watch television, and Inormally knit during this time. We go to bed about 23.30.
